parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the Solarwatt Energymanager.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Interval between updates to device data (in seconds).

parameter.name: rescan
parameter.label: Device Rescan Interval
parameter.description: Interval between scans for newly detected devices (in minutes).

parameter.name: guid
parameter.label: Device GUID
parameter.description: GUID of the device as used by the Solarwatt Energymanager.
